Menu.name: Homestyle Chhole Puri with Sevaiyyan Kheer
Menu.description: Enjoy the rustic flavours of Punjab with this homestyle Chhole, served with 5 Ajwain Puris and Sevaiyyan Kheer to complete the awesomeness!
